answers.author: Veronica Frenkel
answers.text:
The following link will take you to the Washoe County Lobbying Policy: State Legislature, which provides guidelines and requirements that must be followed by all county officers, employees and contract lobbyists while engaged in legislative activities and lobbying: activities.http://www.washoecounty.us/repository/files/13/Lobbying%20Policy%203-2006.pdf

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for information/documentation re: samples of cities internal policies and procedural guidelines for legislative activities and sample legislative packets.
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Policies & Procedural Gudelines --Legislative Activities/Packets
